Content.details:
This proposal contains to code to update the `tx_withdraw` wasm in storage. With this new update, any withdraw tx will emit an event that contains the withdrawn NAM token amount. This is similar to the update executed for `tx_claim_rewards` in Prop #11. Please see the forum post linked in `discussions-to` below for more details.

The proposal code used to generate the WASM within this proposal can be found here: https://github.com/namada-net/namada-governance-upgrades/blob/b3221f02b26ab5c7e08cef4496930b0f632ca4f0/update-tx-withdraw/src/lib.rs.

The new tx_withdraw wasm itself was generated with the changes within: https://github.com/namada-net/namada/pull/4778
Content.title: Update tx_withdraw wasm on-chain
